channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: More and more older Americans want to know their Alzheimer's status, survey finds
item.description: A survey of 1700 Americans 45 and older found that 79% would want to know if they were in the early stages of Alzheimer's.

item.title: Word of the Week: Crimea's tumultuous history shrouds the origin of its very name

item.title: In first 100 days, Trump tests limits, creates chaos and turns from allies
item.description: From foreign policy and tariffs to immigration changes and targeting of DEI, here's a look back at some of the major moves made in the past 100 days o...

item.title: A man chopped down Los Angeles trees. The crime cut deep in the struggling neighborhood
item.description: For days, police say, Samuel Patrick Groft cruised through the streets of Los Angeles on his bicycle, single-handedly chopping down about a dozen city...

item.title: With a focus on unity, Vietnam celebrates 50 years since war's end
item.description: A focus away from the past and on how the private sector can lead future economic growth underscored celebrations in the capital of the former South V...

item.title: Teen arrested after 3 people shot dead at hair salon in Sweden

item.title: Hotel fire in Kolkata, India kills at least 14 people, police say

item.title: Immigrants working legally in the Texas Panhandle live in limbo under Trump’s crackdown
item.description: Confusion and fear are rippling through the immigrant communities of the Texas Panhandle, where newcomers have come for generations to work in its imm...

item.title: Toxic mushroom meal was 'terrible accident', says woman on trial for murder
item.description: Erin Patterson admits lying to police about her relatives' deaths, but will argue they were a "terrible accident".

item.title: Israeli forces arrest prominent Palestinian journalist in West Bank
item.description: Ali al-Samoudi, who has worked extensively with Western media, was detained during what the Israeli military said were counter-terrorism raids.

item.title: Takeaways from AP’s report on how Trump’s immigration crackdown resonates in the Texas Panhandle
Malta's golden passport scheme breaks EU law, top court rules
item.description: The scheme lets people become citizens after paying, buying or renting property of a certain value, and donating to charity.

item.title: Iowa immigrant group is alarmed by a state lawmaker’s demand for confidential information
Taiwan condemns Somalia travel ban
item.description: Taiwanese are warned against traveling to Somalia or Somaliland for their own safety before the ban is lifted.

item.title: Pakistan claims India planning to attack within 36 hours as tension soars
item.description: Pakistan says India is planning to attack imminently in response to a deadly terrorist attack that Delhi blames on its nuclear armed neighbor.

item.title: Swedish police arrest teenager after fatal triple shooting
item.description: The arrest comes after three people, all reportedly under the age of 20, were shot dead in a hair salon.

item.title: 4/29: America Decides
item.description: Numbers behind Trump's first 100 days of 2nd term; state of Democratic resistance to Trump administration
